<NEW>
=

At this point, WHEELIE nodded over at ASTRA and FIREHORN.  Taking the mome=
nt to contemplate the duo being factionless in this realm, and not being aw=
rae of the differences between hte factions gave him to a quick pair of con=
clusions.  the first that they had been blank protoforms and then activated=
, but not had proper datafiles installed by whomever had brought htem onlin=
e.

Keeping these conclusions ot himself until he met the 'leader' of this =
group, "Very well, today I play.  You may call me WHEELIE if you want this =
way."  Walking along with the two if they led him, but letting them go in '=
front' of him to lead.  "And I must say, you speak weird to me this way.  W=
hich of us right, in what manner words come to light?"

Keeping the two in =
front of him where, hopefully as he followed he could surreptitiously keep =
them 'covered' wtih his weapon if they were leading to ambush, and have a m=
oment if it came to worst he could disengage befor ethey could fire on him.=
  still playing up the role of the addled Autobot.
